body.p: The Committee received a request to issue guidance on the accounting for waste removal (‘stripping’) costs incurred in the production phase of a surface mine (‘production stripping costs’). Accounting for production stripping costs is challenging, because the costs that are incurred may benefit both future and current period production, and there is no specific guidance in IFRSs that addresses this issue.
